---
id: disable-integration
title: "Disable an Integration"
description: "The **Disable an Integration** endpoint allows you to deactivate a specific integration within your organization identified by its unique `name`. Disabling an integration stops its operation while retaining its configuration, allowing you to re-enable it later if needed."
sidebar_label: "Disable an Integration"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: reference/merchant/boomfi-merchants-api
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Disable an Integration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/integrations/{name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **Disable an Integration** endpoint allows you to deactivate a specific integration within your organization identified by its unique `name`. Disabling an integration stops its operation while retaining its configuration, allowing you to re-enable it later if needed.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The name of the integration to be disabled.","name":"name","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
